QuestData.Title: Saving the Botanica
QuestData.Description: Kael'thas' forces in the Botanica were unsuccessful in handling the numerous creatures contained within. We must take action to right their wrongs.$B$BThe first step is to eliminate their forces so that they cannot cause further problems.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Now, we must deal with the experiments.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal wants you to kill Commander Sarannis, High Botanist Freywinn, and Thorngrin the Tender inside the Botanica of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: They were going to die to the creatures contained here soon even without our interference. It is for the greater good.
